Title: 🖼 💪DTEK returns the light: over the last week, we managed to re...
Description: 💪DTEK restores the light: in the last week, we managed to restore electricity supply to almost 200,000 families after shelling by the Russian occupiers. Title: 🎬 Is there a shortage of coal in Ukraine? Actually no. On the co...
Description: Is there a shortage of coal in Ukraine? Actually, no. On the contrary, coal reserves are currently the largest in the last 20 years. Since the beginning of this year, DTEK launched two new coal mining sites, the so-called coal mines. In total, last year the company invested 7.5 billion hryvnias in coal mining. Title: 🎬 💡 Why do we have light? The secret is obvious — it is the rou...
Description: 💡 Why do we have light? The secret is obvious — it is the round-the-clock titanic work of energy workers. In 2024, DTEK repaired and updated more than 14,000 km of lines and 6,000 energy facilities — 80% more than in 2023. The company spent UAH 4.5 billion to ensure that the energy system was stable even in the face of unprecedented attacks in world history .The battle for light continues. Title: 🖼 ♻️DTEK invests 450 million euros in the construction of the Ty...
Description: ♻️DTEK invests 450 million euros in the construction of the Tyligul wind power plant - the largest investment project since the beginning of the full-scale invasion. We continue to strengthen the Ukrainian energy industry during the war. This year, DTEK plans to speed up the construction of the Tyligul wind farm. The number of turbines of the wind farm will increase from 19 to 83, and the capacity will increase four times - from 114 to 500 MW. The total investment in the construction will amount to 650 million euros. At full capacity, the Tyligul wind farm will produce 1.7 TWh of electricity per year — this is enough to power 900,000 Ukrainian homes, which is equivalent to the energy needed to charge every smartphone in the EU for a year. We plan to complete the construction of the expanded wind farm by the end of 2026. ‼️This project will be the largest private sector investment in Ukraine since the full-scale invasion of Russia and the largest private investment in the country's energy sector in history. The battle for light continues! Let's stand and win!

Title: 🖼 💡 In 2024, DTEK invested UAH 11 billion in TPP repairs and co...
Description: 💡 In 2024, DTEK invested UAH 11 billion in TPP repairs and coal mining. At the most critical moment of the year, 90% of capacities were destroyed. ❓ What did DTEK do? The company invested UAH 11 billion of its own funds: ⏺ UAH 3 billion — for the restoration of the TPP. This made it possible to return to work more than half of the destroyed capacities before the start of the heating season. UAH 7.5 billion — for the operation of mines: major repairs, equipment renewal, modernization of transport. This provided coal reserves for the stable operation of the stations. The battle for light continues! 🔥

Title: 🖼 💡Lights were restored to Kyiv in the city center after smoke ...
Description: 💡Lights were returned to Kyiv in the city center after smoke in the city collector Today, an accident occurred in the city collector of the capital, which led to smoke. Because of this, the power engineers had to turn off the equipment and residents of 44 buildings were temporarily left without electricity. As of 1:41 p.m., we managed to restore power. Currently, all residents of Kyiv have electricity again ✅
